name: Touch the Stars (Kittyking101)
description:
Reach for the stars! 

The more stars you touch, the more your character levels up. The more your character levels up, the more stars you can touch. 

It gets quite sparkly! 

Epic Toon FX used for particle effects. 

3D model and animation by Virian. 

This game was made for MyFirstGameJam Winter 2023. The theme: Growth. I made this to recapture the joy of making games. Even if this one is less than 10% of the game I wanted to make, I enjoyed the process and hope it continues to grow.
